# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds significant value for many individuals seeking high-quality solutions. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I would like to propose a price of $200 for this item. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value it brings to its users. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
